creator: xyntrix@bitz.org
text:
Created attachment 25248
Unified diff against apache-httpd 2.2.15 to provide trunk revision 893027

This is a request to backport trunk rev 893027 to Apache 2.2.(15) and to get this feature included in future 2.2.x releases.

Trunk revision:
http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?view=revision&revision=893027

Fix was filed as PR 41887,
https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=41887#c0

Short summary:
Add option to skip the documentroot check during httpd start.

Purpose:
Performance enhancement to httpd startup when slow/potentially unreachable media is used or if there is a large number of VirtualHosts configured.


Attached is the backport patch for Apache 2.2 (feel free to admire my ability to cut and paste).
